ygData.subject: RE: Pixie Strike in PvP
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually i duel d a friend of mine, also a lvl 50 cleric. I tried out the psalm of mystic shielding plus my base 38 magic resistance. I resisted
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:27 AM 10/9/1999 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
>i don't remember a patch since i fought that level 50 cleric in a duel, and
>it worked wonders, interrupting him every time. that was approximately 1
>week ago. guess i have to try it again. this will KILL my duel strategy =)
>
>Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
>Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
>Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
>Manda, Level 11 Wood Elf Warrior
>Mithaniel Marr Server
>


Actually i duel'd a friend of mine, also a lvl 50 cleric. I tried out the
psalm of mystic shielding plus my base 38 magic resistance. I resisted
everything. And i mean everything. Poor guy did 0 dmg to me (might have hit
me once if he had tried to use his mace heh). Stuns, blindness,
Retribution, etc. Total resists everytime. Inbetween my interrupting him
with pixie strike and my 100% immunity to his spells... he was pretty
frustrated. One nice thing about pixie strike also is that it will stun
them still... so if they are running around like a chicken with their head
cut off, this will nail them in their tracks so you can get up the shield,
chain them, and then maybe a pulse of verses of victory or the lvl 48
largos or whatever else you want before turning on attack. This was my real
first pvp attempt ever btw, just didnt expect to whip him so soundly :)

Gendal Concorden, lvl 50 Bard
Enoch Lyciferous, lvl 40 Necromancer
Tunare
